data.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2017 Demo
data.detailed_description:
The award winning series returns taking the famed gameplay to a new level by achieving interactive reality.

Download the demo now to experience new features such as Real Touch and Precise Pass. The new features compliment the focus for the series, which is enjoying playing PES with friends.
data.about_the_game:
The award winning series returns taking the famed gameplay to a new level by achieving interactive reality.

Download the demo now to experience new features such as Real Touch and Precise Pass. The new features compliment the focus for the series, which is enjoying playing PES with friends.
data.short_description: Download the demo now get ready to Control Reality with PES 2017.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Arabic*, Dutch, Greek*, Korean, Portuguese*, Portuguese-Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7 SP1, Vista SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 1.8GHz / AMD Athlon Ⅱ X2 240 or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card. 1024MB Pixel Shader 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 8800 / AMD/ATI Radeon X1600 / Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 800 x 600 monitor resolution; 4x DVD-ROM Drive; TCP/IP 512 kbps or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7 SP1, Vista SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 / AMD Phenom Ⅱ X4 925 or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card. 1024MB Pixel Shader 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD/ATI Radeon HD4850 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 monitor resolution; 8x DVD-ROM Drive; TCP/IP 1.5 Mbps or higher
